Annotations.Annotation: Cube Schema for CCRS - Joint Communication & Advocacy Profile

ExpressionView.SQL: select M.ID, M.FOR_WHICH_ISSUES_ADDRESSED_STRATEGY_ID, CP1.DESIGNATION, CP1.ENTITY_YEAR, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from CP6JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES M, CP6JOINT_COMMUNICATION_ADVOCACY CP6, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE CP1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE M.PARENT_ID = CP6.ID AND CP1.DESIGNATION = CP6.DESIGNATION AND CP1.ENTITY_YEAR = CP6.ENTITY_YEAR AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND CP1.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND CP1.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and CP1.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = CP1.ENTITY_YEAR

select cp6.ID, cp6.DESIGNATION, cp6.ENTITY_YEAR, cp6.UNCT_ADVOCACY_MODEL_ID, CP1.COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CP1.SECONDARY_COUNTRY_INCOME_STATUS_ID, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMONUNCTWEBSITE, cp6.COMMONUNCTURL, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_FACEBOOK_PAGE, cp6.COMMON_FACEBOOKURL, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMON_TWITTER_ACCOUNT, cp6.TWITTER_HANDLE, cp6.COORDINATOR_TWITTER_HANDLE, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COORDINATOR_TWITTER_ACCOUNT, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_GUIDING_PRINCIPLES_COMMON_MESSAGING, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_JOINT_ADVOCACY_STRATEGIES_ON_NORMATIVE_ISSUES, CASE WHEN cp6.IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF_COUNT, CASE cp6.IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as IS_COMMUNICATIONS_PART_OFUNDAF, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_COMMUNICATION_TOGETHER_IN_TIME_CRISIS, CASE WHEN cp6.HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED = TRUE THEN 1 ELSE 0 END as HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED_COUNT, CASE cp6.HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as HAS_VISUAL_IDENTITY_ESTABLISHED, CASE cp1.OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY WHEN TRUE THEN 1 WHEN FALSE THEN 0 ELSE -1 END as OFFICIAL_REQUEST_DAO_COUNTRY from CP6JOINT_COMMUNICATION_ADVOCACY cp6, CP1GENERAL_PROFILE cp1, BASE_COUNTRY bc, v_cp_validated_designations v WHERE cp6.DESIGNATION = cp1.DESIGNATION AND cp6.ENTITY_YEAR = cp1.ENTITY_YEAR AND cp6.DESIGNATION != 'AQ' AND cp6.DESIGNATION != 'DOCO' AND cp6.DESIGNATION = bc.iso2 and cp6.designation = v.designation and v.entity_year = cp6.ENTITY_YEAR

Dimension.caption: Which issue does the strategy primarily address?

The model that best describes the UNCT's work on advocacy

Dimension.caption: Is the UNCG guided by the UN DPI SOP on communicating together in times of crisis?

Dimension.caption: Does the UNCT have an established visual identity for joint UN communications?

Measure.name: hasCommonUNCTWebsite
Measure.caption: Count of 'Do you have a common website for the UNCT?'

Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the Resident Coordinator have a Twitter account?'

Measure.caption: Count of 'Has the UNCT agreed on common messaging on any topic?'

Measure.name: hasJointAdvocacyStrategiesOnNormativeIssues
Measure.caption: Count of 'Do you have a joint advocacy strategy to promote the implementation of the SDGs?'

Measure.name: isCommunicationsPartOfUNDAF
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is communications and advocacy budget part of your UNDAF/Common Budgetary Framework?'

Measure.name: hasCommunicationTogetherInTimeCrisis
Measure.caption: Count of 'Is the UNCG guided by the UN DPI SOP on communicating together in times of crisis?'

Measure.name: hasVisualIdentityEstablished
Measure.caption: Count of 'Does the UNCT have an established visual identity for joint UN communications?'
